contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox military award |name=Order of the Cross of the Eagle |image=[[File:Kotkarist1kl.gif|200px]] |caption=Sash and star of the 1st Class of the order |awarded_by={{EST}} |type=Order granted in 5 classes with three affiliated crosses, in both civil and military divisions. |eligibility=Civilians and military personnel |for= military services and services in the field of national defence |campaign= |status= |description= |clasps= |established= 17 February 1928<br>13 September 1936 as a state order |first_award= |last_award= |total= |posthumous= |recipients= |individual= |higher=[[Order of the White Star]] |same= [[Order of the Estonian Red Cross]] |lower= |related= |image2=[[File:EST Order of the Cross of the Eagle 1st Class BAR.png|100px]]<br>1st Class<br> [[File:EST Order of the Cross of the Eagle 2nd Class BAR.png|100px]]<br>2nd Class<br> [[File:EST Order of the Cross of the Eagle 3rd Class BAR.png|100px]]<br>3rd Class<br> [[File:EST Order of the Cross of the Eagle 4th Class BAR.png|100px]]<br>4th Class<br> [[File:EST Order of the Cross of the Eagle 5th Class BAR.png|100px]]<br>5th Class<br> [[File:EST Order of the Cross of the Eagle - Gold Cross BAR.png|100px]]<br>Gold Cross<br> [[File:EST Order of the Cross of the Eagle - Silver Cross BAR.png|100px]]<br>Silver Cross<br> [[File:EST Order of the Cross of the Eagle - Iron Cross BAR.png|100px]]<br>Iron Cross |caption2= Ribbon bars of the Order of the Cross of the Eagle }} The '''Order of the Cross of the Eagle''' ({{lang-et|Kotkaristi teenetemärk}}; {{lang-fr|Ordre de la Croix de l'Aigle}}) was instituted in 1928 by the [[Estonian Defence League]] to commemorate the tenth anniversary of [[Estonia]]n independence. It was adopted as a state order in 1936.<ref>[http://www.medals.org.uk/estonia/estonia-republic/estonia4.htm Estonia: The Order of the Cross of the Eagle] Medals of the World, Megan C. Robertson. 2008-08-23</ref> The Order of the Cross of the Eagle is bestowed to give recognition for military services and services in the field of national defence. It is awarded in civil and military divisions. The awards made to members of the military are denoted by the addition of crossed swords to the decoration.<ref>[http://www.president.ee/en/estonia/decorations/decorations.php?gid=119473 Order of the Cross of the Eagle]. President of the Republic of Estonia, State Decorations. Retrieved 2011-1-22</ref> ==Classes== The Order of the Cross of the Eagle comprises eight classes: * Five basic classes - 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th and 5th class; * Three medal classes - crosses in gold, silver and iron; The crosses of all the classes of the Order of the Cross of the Eagle have the same design. The colour tone of the orange moiré ribands belonging to the decorations of all the classes of the Order of the Cross of the Eagle is determined according to the international [[PANTONE]] colour-table as 137 MC.<ref>[https://www.riigiteataja.ee/akt/13250842 Decorations Act]. Decorations of the Republic of Estonia, 12-19-2007.</ref> The Order of the Cross of the Eagle is a military decoration if two crossed swords are affixed to it as follows: *The cross has crossed swords movably attached at the hilts of the swords to the tips of the top arms of the cross. The length of the swords together with their hilts is 35 mm for the 1st, 2nd and 3rd class decorations and 33 mm for the 4th and 5th class decorations and the gold, silver and iron crosses; *The star has crossed swords affixed to the oblique rays of the star and the vertical and horizontal rays remain uncovered. The swords are set hilts down. The length of each sword is 85 mm. The medals of the affiliated crosses of the Order of the Cross of the Eagle have swords in the same metal as their cross.<ref>[https://www.riigiteataja.ee/akt/13250842 Decorations Act]. Decorations of the Republic of Estonia, 12-19-2007.</ref> ==Gallery== <gallery widths="180px" heights="200px" perrow="3"> File:Kotkarist1kl.gif|1st Class (Male) File:Kotkarist1klD.gif|1st Class (Female) File:Kotkarist2kl.gif|2nd Class (Male) File:Kotkarist2klD.gif|2nd Class (Female) File:Kotkarist3kl.gif|3rd Class (Male) File:Kotkarist3klD.gif|3rd Class (Female) File:Kotkarist4kl.gif|4th Class File:Kotkarist5kl.gif|5th Class File:Orde van het Adelaarskruis Estland tweemaal.jpg|5th Class of the Order of the Cross of the Eagle, with the military version at right File:Kotkarkuld.gif|Golden Cross File:Kotkarhobe.gif|Silver Cross File:Kotkaraudrist.gif|Iron Cross </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{commons category}} * [http://www.president.ee/en/estonia/decorations/bearers.php?tm=Kotkaristi List of recipients] {{Estonian state decorations}} [[Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Estonia]] [[Category:Awards established in 1928]]
